Articles.Content: In case anyone missed it, the Asteroid mod was also updated. There are no version numbers, but the curse page for it list some bug fixes and that it was updated for 1.0.5
I'm honestly surprised it wasn't just added to the base game with this update.

And here is the link to the download to save everybody some time:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232196-asteroid-day/2265988
Both official addons were updated with 1.0.5, if you feel like a game of football.

I'm honestly surprised it wasn't just added to the base game with this update.

Yes I agree^^

Both official addons were updated with 1.0.5, if you feel like a game of football.

Anybody have a link for the New official world cup mod. A Curseforge search turns up no results.
So... does one need to download the latest version or does it automatically get updated when you upgrade (say, through steam) to 1.0.5?
I just saw Chatterer (my personal favorite) has also been updated to 1.0.5

Ok, I found the world cup mod.

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221319-kerbin-cup
